title: Looking for a few presentable lower-grade OJs
author: scotgreb

posts.post_title: Looking for a few presentable lower-grade OJs
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following in lower grade -- preferably graded:

[STRIKE]Ross Barnes
Tommy Bond[/STRIKE]
Pete Browning
Paul Hines
Dummy Hoy
Bobby Mathews
Harry Stovey

Please PM or email if you have any available.

Thanks,
Scott
Barnes and Bond have no OJs. Browning has not come to market in years and if it does it is a multi-thousand dollar card.

[quote name="oldjudge" post=1834111]Barnes and Bond have no OJs. Browning has not come to market in years and if it does it is a multi-thousand dollar card.[/QUOTE]

When JSA starts "authenticating" cards, contact me, I'll be able to provide you with the first Ross Barnes OJ on the market:

[url]http://http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=336737&stc=1&d=1544304334[/url]

Barnes and Bond have no OJs.

Thanks for the corrections -- I misread / sorted my Want List.

Scott
Im losing my marbles..... thought by the title you were looking to pick up some beaten down OJ Simpson cards cheap!  LOL yes I know its not the football thread, like I said my marbles!
